channel.title: nginx on 西凉观云海
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on 西凉观云海

item.title: 构建nginx容器
item.description: docker run -itd --name=nginx -p 80:80 -p 443:443 -v /usr/local/small/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d -v /usr/local/small/web/facepark/static:/root/web/facepark/static nginx:2.0 docker run -itd --name=nginx -p 80:80 -p 443:443 -v /home/zouni/nginx/conf.d:/etc/nginx/conf.d -v /home/zouni/web/static:/home/zouni/web/static nginx:latest
